definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Bismuth occurs very rarely in nature.
sentences.chinese: 和那些少量金屬元素一樣，自然界裏鉍生成量很少。

sentences.english: The quantitative relation between Bi segregation and growth rate was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了鉍的分凝係數與生長率的定量關係。

sentences.english: Sb and Zn was more prominent than that in the analysis of In.
sentences.chinese: 它在鎘銻鋅分析中的作用比錮鉍鉛中明顯。

sentences.english: The process design for reconstruction and expansion engineering of Hunan Shizhuyuan Bismuth Smelter is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹湖南柿竹園公司鉍冶煉改擴建的工藝設計。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a separation method for a bismuth-molybdenum-copper-sulfide mixed concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 一種鉍鉬銅硫混合精礦的分離方法。

sentences.english: There- fore, a method is developed to determine trace Bismuth in copper and copper alloy with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 用該法測定銅和銅合金中微量鉍取得滿意結果。

sentences.english: It is very heavy and chemically resembles arsenic and antimony.
sentences.chinese: 像砷和銻一樣，鉍也是重金屬和重化學元素。

sentences.english: Bismuth is the by-product of lead and copper refining, as well as other metals to a smaller degree.
sentences.chinese: 鉍是鉛和銅精煉後的副產品。

sentences.english: The most preferred components of hot galvanizing Zn-Bi alloys are determined.
sentences.chinese: 確定了鋅鉍多元合金的最佳配方。

sentences.english: The determination of bismuth in the zinc can of primary battery was studied based on the Beer's Law.
sentences.chinese: 應用比耳定律，對乾電池鋅筒中鉍的測定進行了探討。

sentences.english: Object To study the effect of bismuth potassium glycyrrhizate on gastric ulcers in rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甘草酸鉍鉀對胃潰瘍的影響。

sentences.english: Bismuth oxide is a advanced functional powder material, having wide application perspectives.
sentences.chinese: 氧化鉍是一種先進的功能粉體材料，應用前景廣闊。

sentences.english: This method is applied to the determination of trace Bismuth in high purity nickel.
sentences.chinese: 方法已應用於高純鎳中痕量鉍的測定。

sentences.english: The processing method for bismuth-tellurium concentrate was pyrometallurgy traditionally.
sentences.chinese: 對鉍碲精礦的處理，傳統的方法是火法冶煉。

sentences.english: Conclusion Chitosan - bismuth showed evident prophylactic and therapeutic effects on rat gastric ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 結論殼聚糖鉍對大鼠實驗性胃潰瘍有明顯的防治作用。

sentences.english: A method for determination of arsenic in refined bismuth has been established.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種精鉍中砷的測定方法。

definition: milliwatt (old)/single-character equivalent of 毫瓦[hao2 wa3]
a long narrow vessel with two masts
door or window in an upper story
